mapper.insert: insert into productbuy(o_odno, p_pno, o_pquantity) values((select nvl(max(o_odno),0)+1 from productbuy), #{p_pno}, #{o_pquantity})
mapper.select: select * from productbuy order by o_odno asc
mapper.update: update productbuy set p_pno = #{p_pno}, o_pquantity = #{o_pquantity} where o_odno = #{o_odno}
